choose:  
A. I see the balcony on the 22nd floor in the lower left corner of my field of view.  
B. I see the balcony on the 22nd floor on the right side of my field of view.  
C. I see the balcony on the 22nd floor in the upper right corner of my field of view.  
D. I do not see the balcony on the 22nd floor in my field of view.  
E. I see the balcony on the 22nd floor in the center of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The initial position shows a view of tall buildings and a cityscape, but there is no visible balcony on the 22nd floor within the field of view. The perspective does not include close-up details of specific floors or balconies.
